review.title: “Dissatisfied service rep for convenience stores”
review.pros: Pros – Good pay. Good vacation time no holiday pay
review.cons: Cons – Used to be a great place to work but over the past few years they have tried to increase there bottom line. By doing so they are losing alot of good employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owner of the company needs to be more involved at all levels of the company from sales to delivery the drivers are the last point of contact as if with lots of things and there no more happy than anyone at the company.

review.title: “Heading Downhill Fast”
review.pros: Pros – The pay is the only good thing about the company and money can only carry so far.
review.cons: Cons – Managements complete lack of concern for employees, benefits, lack of communication,substandard equipment
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
